UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-function relationships in the tryptophan-rich, antimicrobial peptide indolicidin.
Literature.Author: Staubitz P, Peschel A, Nieuwenhuizen WF, Otto M, Götz F, Jung G, Jack RW

Literature.Title: Indolicidin analogs with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity and low hemolytic activity
Literature.Author: Smirnova MP, Kolodkin NI, Kolobov AA, Afonin VG, Afonina IV, Stefanenko LI, Shpen VM, Shamova OV

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:4% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis IFO 3513(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli IFO 12734(MIC=>100.0µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=6.3µM),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC50=8±0.22µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes EGD(MIC50=9.7±0.92µg/ml),Candida albicans 820(MIC50=200µg/ml)
